question: In distributed system, each processor has its own ___________
answers: c) both local memory and clock

question: If one site fails in distributed system then ___________
answers: a) the remaining sites can continue operating
b) all the sites will stop working
c) directly connected sites will stop working

question: Network operating system runs on ___________
answers: b) every system in the network
c) both server and every system in the network

question: Which technique is based on compile-time program transformation for accessing remote data in a distributed-memory parallel system?
Logical extension of computation migration is ___________
Processes on the remote systems are identified by ___________
Which routing technique is used in a distributed system?
In distributed systems, link and site failure is detected by ___________
The capability of a system to adapt the increased service load is called ___________
In distributed system, each processor has its own ___________
answers: c) both local memory and clock
